channel.title: CVE Feed for Hitachi ABB Power Grids -- eSOMS
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Hitachi ABB Power Grids -- eSOMS

item.title: CVE-2021-35527|2024-08-04T00:40:46.939Z -- hitachi%20abb%20power%20grids -- esoms
item.description: Password autocomplete vulnerability in the web application password field of Hitachi ABB Power Grids eSOMS allows attacker to gain access to user credentials that are stored by the browser. This issue affects: Hitachi ABB Power Grids eSOMS version 6.3 and prior versions.
